name: linear
description: MCP server for Linear issue tracking. Creates issues, sets priorities, links dependencies, assigns sprints, and applies labels. Used by the Integration Planner to export the full project plan into a Linear workspace.

tools.name: create_issue
tools.description: Create a new issue in a Linear team with title, description, priority, estimate, and labels

tools.name: update_issue
tools.description: Update an existing issue's fields (status, assignee, priority, sprint)

tools.name: create_issue_relation
tools.description: Link two issues with a dependency relationship (blocks / blocked-by)

tools.name: list_teams
tools.description: List available teams to find the correct team ID for issue creation

tools.name: list_cycles
tools.description: List sprint cycles to assign issues to the correct sprint

tools.name: create_label
tools.description: Create labels for workstream, type, and skill tagging

tools.name: create_project
tools.description: Create a Linear project to group all issues under a single project view

tools.name: create_project_milestone
tools.description: Create milestones within the Linear project matching the Scheduler's milestone plan

use_cases: Export all tasks from the task list as Linear issues with estimates and acceptance criteria
Set issue priorities matching the Resource Allocator's prioritization output
Link issue dependencies using blocks/blocked-by relations from the dependency graph
Assign issues to sprint cycles matching the Scheduler's calendar
Apply labels for workstream, task type, complexity, and skill requirements
Create project milestones matching the Scheduler's milestone plan
team_integration: The Integration Planner activates this server in Phase 6 when CONFIG.local.md specifies task_management: linear. It reads the complete task list, dependency graph, priority rankings, and sprint assignments from previous phases, then creates the full Linear workspace in a single pass. After export, it verifies issue count matches the task list and all dependencies are linked.

LINEAR_API_KEY.how_to_get: Linear app > Settings > API > Personal API keys > Create key
